name: semigloss
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of paint) producing a fairly shiny appearance on a surface when it dries: Apply two coats of premium semigloss paint. The gloss on semi-gloss paint absorbs some light.
More examplesFewer examplesUse a semi-gloss paint on the walls because it is easy to clean up with soapy water and a sponge.The semi-gloss finish of the vintage yellow lacquer feels welcoming straight away.He'd painted above the tile wainscoting in a semi-gloss aubergine.

paint that produces a fairly shiny appearance on a surface when it dries: Then apply a final coat of semigloss. Flat paints tend to hide imperfections better than a gloss or a semi-gloss.
More examplesFewer examplesIt used to be that if you wanted a surface that was easy to clean, you had to paint with gloss or semigloss.The color difference wasn't so bad, but there was semigloss underneath.
